item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Spain declares state of emergency in the wake of huge power outage
2. Trump tells Canada to vote for ‘51st state’ in election day intervention
3. Demand slump fuelled by Trump tariffs hits US ports and air freight
4. American students turn to UK as Trump takes aim at US universities
5. [Opinion] The spectre of dollar doomsday still looms
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, April 28, 2025 at 8:20 PM UTC
